pageContext.claim: “We've made a lot of progress that has not been reported by the media, but we have made a lot of progress as far as denuclearization’s concerned, and we're talking about a lot of different things. But we’ve tremendous progress that has not been reported, unfortunately, but it will be. Things are going very well with North Korea.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often depicts his talks with North Korean officials in highly positive terms, but there is no evidence that the two countries have resolved a profound disagreement over what both sides mean by the phrase "denuclearization." Just three days before Trump made this comment, Vice President Pence said: "We still await concrete steps by North Korea to dismantle the nuclear weapons."
